BindingObjectRateCardEntry.name: BindingObjectRateCardEntry
BindingObjectRateCardEntry.description: Represents the rate card entry details of the usage resource associated with the binding object that's used to charge over consumption.

BindingObjectId.description: The object associated with the entitlements that are granted with the sellable product.

BindingObjectRateOrder.description: The order that determines the applicable binding object rate when multiple rates are defined for an Anchor target within an effective period. Available in API version 65.0 and later.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date and time when the associated rate card entry comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: The date and time until which the associated rate card entry remains effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated identifier for the binding object rate card entry record. For example, BORCE-00004 or BORCE-4567.

NegotiatedRate.description: The rate negotiated for the associated binding object.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the record.

RateCardEntryId.description: The rate card entry associated with the binding object.

RateCardId.description: The rate card associated to the binding object.

RateCardType.description: The type of the rate card associated with the binding object rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureId.description: The standard unit of measure associated with the rate defined for the binding object.

SourceAssetId.description: The asset that's used to create the binding object rate card entry.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the binding object rate card entry.
